channel.title: CVE Feed for Joomla! -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Joomla! -- all products

item.title: CVE-2011-4908|2024-08-07T00:23:38.279Z -- joomla%21 -- tinybrowser%20plugin
item.description: TinyBrowser plugin for Joomla! before 1.5.13 allows arbitrary file upload via upload.php.

item.title: CVE-2011-4937|2024-08-07T00:23:38.561Z -- joomla%21 -- joomla%21
item.description: Joomla! 1.7.1 has core information disclosure due to inadequate error checking.

item.title: CVE-2011-4906|2024-08-07T00:23:38.285Z -- joomla%21 -- tiny%20browser%20included%20with%20tinymce%203.0
item.description: Tiny browser in TinyMCE 3.0 editor in Joomla! before 1.5.13 allows file upload and arbitrary PHP code execution.

item.title: CVE-2011-4912|2024-08-07T00:23:38.308Z -- joomla%21 -- joomla%21
item.description: Joomla! com_mailto 1.5.x through 1.5.13 has an automated mail timeout bypass.
